resources.string:
"I am a Computer Science student with 6 years of programming experience, and ~3 in Android" "development; looking to make my skills robust and explore other fields to build a powerful" "career.\n\n"
"I have joined HNG this year, to see if I could earn some bucks while I learn mobile" "development through my experience at Google Africa Development Scholarship (GADS) '22. In" "due time, that would enable me to beat/crush HNG10 or HNG\'n\'."
